title: The Battle For Okinawa
description: Critical acclaim for The Battle for Okinawa"An indispensable account of the fighting and of Okinawa's role in the Japanese defense of the home islands." — The Wall Street Journal"A fascinating, highly intelligent glance behind the Japanese lines." — Kirkus Reviews"The most interesting of the 'last battle of the war' books." — The Washington Post"A fascinating insider's view of the Japanese command." — Dallas Morning NewsA Military Book Club Main Selection
author: Hiromichi Yahara
